casebody.data:
No. —, Original.

Ex parte: In the Matter of the Lehigh Valley Railroad Company, Petitioner. (Action No. 2.) Submitted May 5, 1924. Decided May 12, 1924. Mr. Charles A. Boston and Mr. Bindley M. Garrison for petitioner.

Motion for leave to file a petition for a writ of prohibition and/or a writ of mandamus herein denied.
